verses.text: Surely God\f + \fr 73:1 \ft The Hebrew word rendered “God” is “\+wh אֱלֹהִ֑ים\+wh*” (Elohim).\f* \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* those \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w pure|strong="H1249"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

How \w they|strong="H7281"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H7281"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H8552"\w*! \w They|strong="H7281"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w completely|strong="H8552"\w* \w swept|strong="H5486"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w with|strong="H4480"\w* \w terrors|strong="H1091"\w*.

As \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w when|strong="H2472"\w* one wakes \w up|strong="H5782"\w*, \w so|strong="H5782"\w*, Lord,\f + \fr 73:20 \ft The word translated “Lord” is “Adonai.”\f* \w when|strong="H2472"\w* you \w awake|strong="H5782"\w*, you will despise \w their|strong="H5782"\w* fantasies.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* soul \w was|strong="H3824"\w* \w grieved|strong="H2556"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3824"\w* \w embittered|strong="H2556"\w* \w in|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w senseless|strong="H1198"\w* \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w ignorant|strong="H3045"\w*. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* brute beast \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

Nevertheless, \w I|strong="H3027"\w* am \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w*. \w You|strong="H5973"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* held \w my|strong="H3027"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
